item.title: ニノミヤユイ - Dark seeks light ("世界最高の暗殺者、異..
item.description:
작곡: ケンカイヨシ / 작사: ニノミヤユイ
KY: 44742

Rightness corroded.

Remaining regret.

Demolish this story!

Dark seeks light
